definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Each test site can be thought of as an isolated resistor.
sentences.chinese: 可以認爲每個測試點都是一個絕緣的電阻器。

sentences.english: "I realised then that synapses were memristors, " he says.
sentences.chinese: 然後他了解到這種神經突觸是記憶電阻器，“他說。

sentences.english: The preparation technology of nickel paste and thick-film humidity sensitive resistor is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹鎳漿料和厚膜溼敏電阻器的製備工藝。

sentences.english: The resistors are coated to prevent water films from forming on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 電阻器經過表面塗敷，以避免在其表面形成水膜。

sentences.english: The resistor limits the current in case the capacitor becomes shorted.
sentences.chinese: 在電容器短路的情況下，電阻器限制電流的大小。

sentences.english: The maximum rated power of the resistor is specified in Watts .
sentences.chinese: 電阻器的最大額定功率是用瓦特來表示的。

sentences.english: This is the resistor on which the negative bias is developed.
sentences.chinese: 這是在其上面產生負偏壓的電阻器。

sentences.english: High precision and low T. C. R. metal film resistor.
sentences.chinese: 高精密低溫度係數金屬膜電阻器。

sentences.english: A variable resister is called a rheostat.
sentences.chinese: 可以調節的電阻器叫做變阻器。

sentences.english: It looked maddeningly similar to the response a memristor would produce.
sentences.chinese: 他看起來跟記憶電阻器產生的反應令人發狂的相似。

sentences.english: The effect is the same as that of placing a shunt resistor across the active gage.
sentences.chinese: 效果相當於跨工作應變片加了一個分流電阻器一樣。

sentences.english: However, if the resistor is too large, it may affect measurement accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 然而，如果電阻器太大，它可能會影響測量準確度。

sentences.english: The resistor and the capacitor together were the timer, and the transistor worked as the switch.
sentences.chinese: 電阻器和電容器一起組成計時器，晶體管作爲開關。

sentences.english: A variable resister is called a rheostat .
sentences.chinese: 可以調節的電阻器叫做變阻器。

sentences.english: It is reasonably explained that conduction of Ru-base thick-film resistor is caused by tunnel effect.
sentences.chinese: 釕基厚膜電阻器傳導機理的合理解釋爲隧道效應。

sentences.english: Resistors require a reference voltage to work.
sentences.chinese: 電阻器需要一千工作參考電壓。
